item.title: Video Editor for Training Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Editor who specializes in editing training videos with B-Roll footage. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of video editing techniques and a creative eye for storytelling. As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for assembling recorded footage, adding B-Roll, and ensuring a smooth and polished final product. The role requires proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Attention to detail, excellent organization skills, and the ability to work independently are essential. If you have experience editing training videos and can bring our content to life, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 10:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Education, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products / Dropshipping - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products

Job Summary

Create Facebook/IG video ads for our ecommerce products.

Responsibilities:

Create video of product assigned, using video clips from online clips and/or custom videos we provide.
Make sure the video follows the structure of the examples we have
Also make thumbnails for the videos

Requirements
Must be familiar with Facebook video ads
It’s an absolute must you be attentive to details and meticulous. The videos should be clean without errors or inconsistencies.  
English must be good enough to understand what copy to use and edit if need be.
Must know of AI tools for voiceovers (tell us what you use with samples you made)
Must be able to use camtasia so we can share source files and I can edit if need be

If this role is interesting to you, please reach out and express your interest. Please apply using the word “top” to show you've read the entire job post. You must also include sample videos you made from scratch.

Please also answer these questions:

1. can you use camtasia to so we share a folder and edit your videos if we want (you input all the source videos + camtasia file + text overlay)?

2. Can you generate text overlay with AI and your manual edits? What AI software do you use?

3. Can you generate voiceover AI? What app do you use?

4. For 1 video with 3 different hooks (same video with first 3-5 seconds changed only). What would you charge?



Budget: $25
Posted On: June 20, 2024 10:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce, Shopify Dropshipping, Dropshipping
Skills: Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce, Shopify Dropshipping, Dropshipping
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:

The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio demonstrating their expertise in video editing, storytelling, and creating engaging content. They should be familiar with industry-standard video editing software and be able to work with raw footage to create polished and professional-looking videos. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to work within tight deadlines are also essential for this role.

- Creativity
- Strong communication skills

item.title: Videographer for Event in Moscow - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer to capture our upcoming event in Moscow. The event will take place within two different event one starts on 28th Jun to 2nd July another from 8th July to 13 July 2024, so we need someone who is available on short notice. The videographer will be responsible for recording the event, capturing key moments, and creating a high-quality video that reflects the atmosphere and essence of the event. ( Attached sample of video that we are looking for )  This gig requires excellent attention to detail, strong communication skills, and the ability to work well under pressure. The ideal candidate should have experience in event videography & photography as we will request also some photos. We are looking for someone who is creative, reliable, and passionate about delivering exceptional results.

deliverable should be: raw files uploaded upon end of each day, Raw pictures and video. a short videos of each day 3 days of each event. so total 6 short videos, and 2 summrise of each 3 video.
total delivrable should be 6 shorts and 2 summrise videos. including voice over and pictures.


example : https://youtu.be/_QIkUJuBj1I?si=6oYKwrttQisb18Fe
Note: same girl will be on the events along with her brother we need to have her as the star of the show.


Hourly Range: $33.00-$77.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:58 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Camera
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Camera
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

The video should be engaging, informative, and showcase the key features and benefits of our product. The video should be similar in style and quality to the example provided in the job description.

Vide

    - Incorporate text, graphics, and animations to enhance the video

    - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

item.title: Video Shorts Editor For Long-Term Success (Talents Only) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video shorts editor.

We're a growing channel and want you to be part of that success story for the long haul.

We usually share detailed scripts with videos and effects.
But we need a smart editor who doesn't need to be micromanaged :)

RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Edit high-engagement shorts
- Source original high quality videos when needed
- Add text, graphics, and effects

REQUIREMENTS:

- SMART : you must understand the goal, what we want to communicate
- TALENTED / ARTISTIC: come up and apply your ideas
- Attention to detail
- LOVES THE ART: we're not into "timelines", we're into timeless quality

EXAMPLES

Please ignore the politics, we don't do politics:

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/HL9m1cxTHng

https://youtube.com/shorts/ZGWR7vTh_4E

https://www.youtube.com/shorts/N25Q8ecnID0



Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Animated Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Animated Video Creator to join our team. As an Animated Video Creator, you will be responsible for creating high-quality animated videos for various purposes, including marketing, explainer videos, and training materials. You should have a strong understanding of animation techniques and the ability to bring ideas to life through captivating visuals and storytelling.

  Responsibilities:
  - Develop engaging animated videos from concept to completion
  - Collaborate with the team to understand project requirements and objectives
  - Create storyboards, animations, and visual effects
  - Ensure videos adhere to brand guidelines and meet quality standards
  - Edit video footage and add appropriate audio and sound effects
  - Stay updated with industry trends and techniques

  Requirements:
  - Proven work experience as an Animated Video Creator or a similar role
  - Proficient in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Animate, or Toon Boom Harmony
  - Strong knowledge of animation principles and techniques
  - Excellent storytelling and communication skills
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

  If you have a passion for animation and can bring creative ideas to life, we would love to hear from you. This is a remote position with flexible working hours, and the possibility of long-term collaboration.

Budget: $70
Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:51 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, 2D Animation, Animation, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talented Social Media Ad Designer Needed for Compelling TikTok & Meta Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

We are Bill Higham Marine, a family-run marine business based in Bangor, North Wales, specializing in outboard engine sales and service, inflatable boat and RIB sales, and being the UK distributor for Parsun outboards. Our business thrives on word-of-mouth and repeat customers, and we pride ourselves on providing the best user experience.

We're on the hunt for a creative and talented designer to help us convert our raw footage and images into engaging and compelling ads for TikTok and Meta (Facebook/Instagram). If you have a knack for making eye-catching social media content and a passion for the marine world (or at least willing to dive into it), we want to hear from you!

Responsibilities:

Transform raw footage and images into high-quality, engaging social media ads.
Understand our brand and market to create ads that resonate with our target audience.
Work closely with our team to ensure the ads align with our brand’s voice and vision.
Provide creative input

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating social media ads, particularly for TikTok and Meta.
Strong portfolio showcasing your ability to create engaging and high-performing ads.
Proficiency in video editing and graphic design software (Adobe Creative Suite, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Creative mindset with excellent storytelling skills.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Basic understanding of the marine industry is a plus, but not a deal-breaker.

Why Work With Us?
We’re a warm, happy, and positive team with a fantastic spirit.
You'll have the creative freedom to bring your ideas to life.
We're not just about work – we believe in fostering a supportive and fun environment.
We value and appreciate creative talent and provide a stable base for growth.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you’d be a great fit for our team. Highlight any relevant experience and let us know your favourite project to date.

Looking forward to seeing your amazing work and hopefully welcoming you aboard!

Cheers,

Simon Higham
Director, Bill Higham Marine

Hourly Range: $15.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:40 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Brand's ambassador creator in Pakistan - Upwork
item.description:
We are on the lookout for a dynamic and charismatic individual to join our team as a permanent content creator, and we believe you might be the perfect fit!

**Job Requirements:**

- **Nationality:** Pakistani
- **Age:** 20-30 years
- **Location:** Currently residing in Pakistan
- **Language:** Proficient in Urdu and English
- **Skills:** Ability to film and edit videos independently
- **Personality:** Charismatic and comfortable showing your face on camera

As a content creator for our brand, you will play a crucial role in representing our brand. We are looking for someone who can produce engaging and creative content, showcasing the unique features and benefits of our e-wallet service. Your videos will be an essential part of our marketing strategy, helping us connect with our audience in an authentic and relatable manner.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- Create 10-15 high-quality Reels  regularly
- Be the face of our brand, embodying our values and mission

In return, we offer a competitive reward and a chance to be part of an innovative company at the forefront of the digital payment revolution in Pakistan.

If you are passionate about content creation and eager to make an impact, we would love to hear from you. Please send us a few videos of yourself where are you speaking.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together!


Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:22 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Storytelling, Communications, Brand Positioning, Social Media Management
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Storytelling, Communications, Brand Positioning, Social Media Management
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Amazon-related Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to edit our Amazon-related content. The ideal candidate should be able to create videos similar to BlueTuskr's, "How to Create Amazon Listing with Variation - Size and Color." The videos will require editing to enhance visual and audio quality, add captions and subtitles, and ensure a professional finish. The editor should have a strong understanding of Amazon listing requirements and be able to incorporate relevant product images and graphics into the videos.

   Skills required:
   - Video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Strong attention to detail
   - Knowledge of Amazon listing requirements
   - Proficiency in adding captions and subtitles
   - Ability to incorporate product images and graphics into videos

   This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months.

   Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $5.00-$11.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Content Writing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, English
Skills: Video Editing, Content Writing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, English
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
